Indicates whether or not real time protection is enabled (default is true)
Indicates whether or not custom scheduled scan settings are enabled (default is false)
Indicates whether scheduled scan setting type is set to Quick or Full (default is Quick)
Day of the week for scheduled scan (1-Sunday, 2-Monday, ..., 7-Saturday)
When to perform the scheduled scan, measured in minutes from midnight (0-1440). For example: 0 = 12AM, 60 = 1AM, 120 = 2AM.
